Detailed Description

class that stores a vector/tensor state

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

ebl::state_idx::state_idx (  ) 

Constructs a state_idx of order 0.

constructors from specific dimensions

ebl::state_idx::state_idx ( Idx< double >  m  ) 

Constructor. Use the order and dimensions contained in passed Idx idx. Beware that the Idx is passed by copy, to allow special cases like passing an Idx resulting from a select() operation for example. Use this constructor only where it is ok (time-wise) to do a copy.

ebl::state_idx::state_idx ( parameter &  st  ) 

constructors from specific dimensions using a parameter this appends the state_idx into the same Srg as the state_idx passed as argument. This is useful for allocating multiple state_idx inside a parameter. This replaces the Lush function alloc_state_idx.

ebl::state_idx::state_idx ( const Idx< double > &  x,
const Idx< double > &  dx,
const Idx< double > &  ddx 
)

Constructs a state_idx from a state_idx's 3 internal Idx.

constructors from other state_idx

resize methods

void ebl::state_idx::resize1 ( intg  dimn,
intg  size 
) [virtual]

resize one dimension <dimn> with size <size>. The order cannot be changed.

void ebl::state_idx::resize_as ( state_idx &  s  )  [virtual]

resizes this state_idx with same sizes a <s>. Both state_idx are required to have the same order.

void ebl::state_idx::resize_as_but1 ( state_idx &  s,
intg  fixed_dim 
) [virtual]

same as resize_as but leave dimension <fixed_dim> untouched. Both state_idx are required to have the same order.
